Class GameStateDetector

java.lang.Object
engine.forPlayer.forAI.GameStateDetector
public class GameStateDetector extends Object
The GameStateDetector class provides precise identification of the current chess game phase and selects the appropriate evaluation function based on comprehensive position analysis. This class replaces the TaperedEvaluator with specialized evaluators for opening, middlegame, and endgame positions, enhancing evaluation accuracy.
Author:
Aaron Ho

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • detectGamePhase

      public GameStateDetector.GamePhase detectGamePhase(Board board)
      Determines the current phase of the game by analyzing the board position. Uses caching to avoid redundant calculations.
      Parameters:
      board - The current chess board.
      Returns:
      The detected game phase.

    • calculateMaterialScore

      private int calculateMaterialScore(Board board)
      Calculates a material-based score for phase detection. Lower scores indicate progression toward endgame.
      Parameters:
      board - The current chess board.
      Returns:
      A material score for phase detection.

    • calculateDevelopmentScore

      private int calculateDevelopmentScore(Board board)
      Calculates a development score for phase detection. Higher scores indicate more development which suggests middlegame.
      Parameters:
      board - The current chess board.
      Returns:
      A development score for phase detection.

    • evaluateKingActivity

      private int evaluateKingActivity(Board board)

      Parameters:
      board - The current chess board.
      Returns:
      A king activity score for phase detection.

    • calculateKingCentralization

      private int calculateKingCentralization(int kingPosition)
      Calculates a king centralization score. Higher values indicate more central kings which is typical in endgame.
      Parameters:
      kingPosition - The position of the king.
      Returns:
      A centralization score.

    • isKingOnBackRank

      private boolean isKingOnBackRank(King king)
      Checks if a king is on its original back rank.
      Parameters:
      king - The king to check.
      Returns:
      True if the king is on its back rank, false otherwise.

    • determinePhaseFromIndicators

      private GameStateDetector.GamePhase determinePhaseFromIndicators(int materialScore, int developmentScore, int moveCount, int pieceCount, int pawnStructureScore, int kingActivityScore, Board board)
      Determines the game phase based on all calculated indicators. Uses a sophisticated weighted approach to handle edge cases.
      Parameters:
      materialScore - Material-based score.
      developmentScore - Development-based score.
      moveCount - Approximate number of moves made.
      pieceCount - Total pieces remaining.
      pawnStructureScore - Pawn structure evaluation.
      kingActivityScore - King activity evaluation.
      board - The current chess board for additional checks.
      Returns:
      The determined game phase.

    • calculateOpeningScore

      private int calculateOpeningScore(int materialScore, int developmentScore, int moveCount, int pieceCount, Board board)
      Calculates a score indicating how much the position resembles an opening.
      Parameters:
      materialScore - The material score.
      developmentScore - The development score.
      moveCount - The number of moves made.
      pieceCount - The total piece count.
      board - The current chess board.
      Returns:
      A score indicating opening characteristics.
